RelatedSentence: ( MENAFN - Arab News ) Honeymoons and anniversaries are a time for devoted couples to celebrate their marriage and four seasons hotel riyadh at kingdom centre has developed the ultimate package for such romantic occasions .
during 2014 guests can personalize such special occasions with the hotel 's distinct honeymoon and anniversary promotion with different ranging prices depending on room type .
